ygData.subject: Re: Making Plat
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, not exactly...whenever they patch or server goes down for some reason the merchant inventory is reset so all those bat wings get super glued back onto
ygData.messageBody:
Well, not exactly...whenever they patch or server goes down for some reason
the merchant inventory is reset so all those bat wings get super glued back
onto rats to make more bats I guess. Well, at anyrate I'm guessing that the
selling bat wings would work right after a new patch and for a few days
after that.

Omeg


>This doesn't work much anymore... Bat Wings are purchasable in unlimited
>amounts in Kithicor and West Freeport (probably other zones as well, Ogguk
>or Grobb almost ceratinly) for about 14 copper each. People are beginning
>to
>know this. :)
